The download has been completed but it doesn't to be able to save a worksheet. Btw I also can't find an ordinary empty worksheet. Why is this?

If you would like open/save features 

find the Maple 11 execution file (maplew.exe?) or a shortcut to it. Right click--file->Properties. 

Select the compatibility tab. Check the box next to "Run this program in compatibility mode for:" if and select "Windows 2000".

Apply settings and click OK. Start Maple. Open your favorite math document and enjoy!

If you want to save:
1. Download the latest version of java 
2. Go to C:/programs/java and copy the content of the folder called "jre1.6.0_05", and paste it into C:/programs/maple 11, and replace it with the existing "jre" folder

ps. The compatibility mode shouldn't be Windows 2000.

You should now be able to save your Maple sheet
